td.content: s:a white female carpenter aged 35 ys presents with chronic Liver. o:Height 59 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Hepatitis A p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ibuprofen - 600 mg every 8 hours for fever, and ordered Viral Hepatitis A Antibody.
